properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 9 at 2:37AM PST until January 10 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt, and seas
12 to 15 feet at 11 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM, Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR
out 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Seas will be
especially steep and hazardous.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A coastal jet may result in locally higher
gusts up to 45 kt south of Garibaldi.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM PST FRIDAY
